concept.title: Touchdown Tempest
concept.description: Race against time and relentless defenders in this adrenaline-fueled top-down arcade runner. Guide your star quarterback through chaotic fields, dodging tackles, and utilizing unique abilities to reach the endzone for the ultimate victory.
concept.objective: Successfully carry the football to the designated touchdown zone on the opposing side of the field within a time limit, avoiding all enemy tackles.
mechanics: Directional movement with analog stick/WASD: Player controls the quarterback's movement across the field.
Evasion/Dodge: Timed button press allows the quarterback to perform a quick dodge in a specific direction, making them briefly invincible.
Power Meter Management: Performing successful dodges, collecting power-ups, and advancing the ball fills a power meter that can be spent on special abilities.
player_abilities: Spin Move: A quick directional burst of speed and an evasive spin that can phase through one enemy tackle.
Hut! Call: Temporarily freezes all nearby enemies for a short duration, allowing for a clear path.
Sideline Burst: A sustained acceleration that dramatically increases movement speed for a few seconds, ideal for breaking away from pursuit.

enemies.name: Linebacker Lurker
enemies.behavior: Patrols in a set pattern, attempting to intercept the player's path and tackle.

enemies.name: Cornerback Charger
enemies.behavior: Reacts to the player's movement, aggressively charging in a direct line to tackle.

enemies.name: Safety Blitz
enemies.behavior: Emerges from the edges of the screen or from behind formations, sprinting directly towards the player with high speed.

powerups.name: Speed Boost Potion
powerups.effect: Temporarily triples the player's movement speed.

powerups.name: Invincibility Shield
powerups.effect: Makes the player immune to tackles for a short duration.

powerups.name: Power Meter Refill
powerups.effect: Instantly replenishes a significant portion of the player's power meter.

concept.level_progression: Each level represents a different 'quarter' or 'drive' with increasing enemy density, complexity of enemy patrol patterns, and tighter time limits. New enemy types are introduced as players advance through levels. Obstacles like fallen players or equipment may also appear.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for reaching the touchdown zone. Bonus points are awarded for remaining time, number of successful dodges, and collecting optional in-field items.
concept.visual_style: Vibrant and slightly exaggerated cartoonish art style with bold lines and bright colors. Players and environments have a distinct 'arcade game' feel. Dynamic camera angles subtly shift to emphasize speed and action.
concept.sound_theme: Upbeat, energetic electronic soundtrack with driving beats that amplify the sense of urgency and excitement. Punchy sound effects for tackles, dodges, and power-up activations.

level_design.name: The Rookie's Kickoff
level_design.description: The stadium is buzzing as you step onto the field for your first game. Learn the ropes, dodge some tackles, and get a feel for the ball. Focus on building your momentum and understanding the flow of the game.

objectives.description: Advance the ball 5 times towards the endzone.
Collect 3 Star Tokens scattered across the field.
